ygData.msgSnippet: Yea, this week, we are talking about hybrids and dual class. One of the points is that making any such combination should cost money. ANother one is the fusion

Yea, this week, we are talking about hybrids and dual class.

One of the points is that making any such combination should cost 
money.

ANother one is the fusion aspect: there are two ways to accomplish 
this:

you sacrifice two characters to get the fusion or
two characters switch abilities.

Oh yea, obviously, a character can be a hybrid with the promoted 
version of its character.
